hadiths.text: Ali said:"Al-Witr is not incumbent like your obligatory prayers, but it is a Sunnah of Allah's Messenger who said: "Indeed Allah is Witr (One), and He loves Al-Witr, so perform Al-Witr O people of the Qur'an

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْوِتْرَ لَيْسَ بِحَتْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Witr Is Not Incumbent
